verses.roman:
tabe prabhu sabākāre prabodha kariyā
sabāre vidāya dilā susthira hañā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabākāre—all of them; prabodha kariyā—pacifying; sabāre—to every one of them; vidāya dilā—bade farewell; su-sthira hañā—being in a peaceful condition.
translation: Then Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu peacefully calmed them all and bade each of them farewell.
